sqlMap.insert: /* req4600DAO.insertReq4600CBPaste - 요구사항 클립보드 내용 등록 */ INSERT INTO REQ4600 ( PRJ_ID, REQ_ID, REQ_CB_SEQ, CB_FILE_SN, CB_GB_CD, CB_CONTENT_TEXT, CB_THUM_VIEW_CD, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #reqId#, ( SELECT COALESCE(MAX(A.REQ_CB_SEQ)+1,1) FROM REQ4600 A WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# ), #cbFileSn#, #cbGbCd#, #cbContentText#, #cbThumViewCd#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: /* req4600DAO.updateReq4100CbAtchFileId - 요구사항 CB_ATCH_FILE_ID 등록 */ UPDATE REQ4100 A SET A.CB_ATCH_FILE_ID = #cbAtchFileId# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
sqlMap.select:
/* req4600DAO.selectReq4600CBContentList - 요구사항 클립보드 데이터 불러오기 */ SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_ID, A.REQ_CB_SEQ, A.CB_FILE_SN, A.CB_GB_CD, COALESCE(CLOB_TO_CHAR(A.CB_CONTENT_TEXT),' ') AS CB_CONTENT_TEXT, A.CB_THUM_VIEW_CD, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID,'1') AS USR_NM, A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.MODIFY_USR_ID,'1') AS MODIFY_USR_NM
FROM REQ4600 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# ORDER BY A.REQ_CB_SEQ DESC
/* req4600DAO.selectReq4600CBFileSnMax - 요구사항 클립보드 데이터 FILE_SN값 구하기 */ SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CB_FILE_SN),0) AS MAX_CB_FILE_SN FROM REQ4600 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#

/* req4600DAO.selectReq4600CBContentInfo - 요구사항 클립보드 데이터 단건 조회 */ SELECT A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_ID, A.REQ_CB_SEQ, A.CB_FILE_SN, A.CB_GB_CD, COALESCE(CLOB_TO_CHAR(A.CB_CONTENT_TEXT),' ') AS CB_CONTENT_TEXT, A.CB_THUM_VIEW_CD, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID,'1') AS USR_NM, A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.MODIFY_USR_ID,'1') AS MODIFY_USR_NM FROM REQ4600 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.REQ_CB_SEQ = #reqCbSeq#
sqlMap.delete: /* req4600DAO.deleteReq4600CBContentInfo - 요구사항 클립보드 데이터 단건 삭제 */ DELETE FROM REQ4600 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND REQ_ID = #reqId# AND REQ_CB_SEQ = #reqCbSeq#
sqlMap.update: /* req4600DAO.updateReq4600CBContentInfo - 요구사항 클립보드 데이터 단건 수정 */ UPDATE REQ4600 A SET A.CB_CONTENT_TEXT = #cbContentText# ,A.CB_THUM_VIEW_CD = #cbThumViewCd# ,A.MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.REQ_CB_SEQ = #reqCbSeq#
sqlMap.select: /* req4600DAO.selectReq4600CBMaxSeq - 요구사항 클립보드 다음 SEQ 구하기 */ SELECT COALESCE(MAX(A.REQ_CB_SEQ)+1,1) as MAX_REQ_CB_SEQ FROM REQ4600 A WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#

/* req4600DAO.selectReq4600ReqWbsListAjax - 요구사항 WBS차트 */ SELECT T1.PRJ_ID /* 프로젝트 ID */ , T1.REQ_ID /* 요구사항 ID */ , T1.REQ_NM /* 요구사항 명 */ , SF_REPLACE_ALL(T1.REQ_DESC ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , '' ) AS REQ_DESC /* 요구사항 설명 */ , T1.REQ_ST_DU_DTM /* 작업시작 예정일자 */ , T1.REQ_ED_DU_DTM /* 작업 종료 예정일자 */ , T1.REQ_ST_DTM /* 작업 시작일자 */ , T1.REQ_ED_DTM /* 작업 종료일자 */ , T1.REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO /* 진척률 */ , T1.REQ_CHARGER_NM /* 담당자 */ , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE /* 요구사항 처리유형 코드*/ , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM /* 요구사항 처리유형 명 */ , T1.REQ_STATUS /* 간트차트의 요구사항 상태 - 신호등 */ FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID /* 프로젝트 ID */ , A.REQ_ID /* 요구사항 ID */ , A.REQ_NM /* 요구사항 명 */ , A.REQ_DESC /* 요구사항 설명 */ , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_ST_DU_DTM /* 작업시작 예정일자 */ , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_ED_DU_DTM /* 작업 종료 예정일자 */ , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DTM /* 작업 시작일자 */ , IFNULL(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DTM /* 작업 종료일자 */ , A.REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO /* 진척률 */ , B.USR_NM AS REQ_CHARGER_NM /* 담당자 */ , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE /* 요구사항 처리유형 코드*/ , (CASE A.REQ_PRO_TYPE WHEN '04' THEN CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(A.REQ_ED_DTM,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'STATUS_FAILED' /* 실패 */ ELSE 'STATUS_DONE' END /* 적기 */ ELSE CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(A.REQ_ED_DTM,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'STATUS_SUSPENDED' /* 초과 */ WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM-3,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(COALESCE(A.REQ_ED_DTM,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'STATUS_WAITING' /* 임박 */ ELSE 'STATUS_ACTIVE' END /* 여유 */ END) AS REQ_STATUS /* 간트차트의 요구사항 상태 - 신호등 */ FROM REQ4100 A INNER JOIN ADM2000 B ON (A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = B.USR_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '01' /* 접수대기가 아닌 요구사항만 조회 */ AND A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM IS NOT NULL AND A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NOT NULL AND A.REQ_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%' AND A.REQ_DESC LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%' AND A.REQ_USR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%' AND B.USR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%' AND A.REQ_ID LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE LIKE '%'||#searchCd#||'%' AND A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM >= TO_DATE( #srchFromDt# , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM <= TO_DATE( #srchToDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) T1 ORDER BY T1.REQ_ST_DU_DTM DESC
sqlMap.update: /* req4600DAO.updateReq4600ProgresInfo - WBS 차트 요구사항 진행률 수정 */ UPDATE REQ4100 SET REQ_COMPLETE_RATIO = #progress# , MODIFY_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND REQ_ID = #reqId#
